org.jgrapes.osgi.factory.core

Interface ComponentFactory<T extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpRequestHandlerFactory<T>, PageResourceProviderFactory<T>, PortletFactory<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BundleListPortletFactory, ChartJsProviderFactory, DatatablesProviderFactory, MarkdownDisplayPortletFactory, MarkdownItProviderFactory, ServiceListPortletFactory, SysInfoPortletFactory

    public interface ComponentFactory<T extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType>

    A general purpose factory interface for components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<T> componentType()
      Returns the type of the components created by this factory.
      default T create()
      Creates a new component with its channel set to itself.
      default T create(org.jgrapes.core.Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
      T create(org.jgrapes.core.Channel componentChannel, Map<Object,Object> properties)
      Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel using the given additional properties.

    • Method Detail

      • componentType

        Class<T> componentType()

        Returns the type of the components created by this factory.

        Returns:
        the component type

      • create

        default T create()

        Creates a new component with its channel set to itself.

        Returns:
        the component

      • create

        default T create(org.jgrapes.core.Channel componentChannel)

        Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.

        Parameters:
        componentChannel - the channel that the component’s handlers listen on by default and that Manager.fire(Event, Channel...) sends the event to
        Returns:
        the component

      • create

        T create(org.jgrapes.core.Channel componentChannel,
         Map<Object,Object> properties)

        Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel using the given additional properties.

        Parameters:
        componentChannel - the channel that the component’s handlers listen on by default and that Manager.fire(Event, Channel...) sends the event to
        properties - additional properties for the creation of the component
        Returns:
        the component
